com.freeiz.ucftxts.client

Class XtremeClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • com.freeiz.ucftxts.client.XtremeClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class XtremeClient
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    Author:
    Michael Scherer Client for interacting with the server, searching for books.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      • Query

        public boolean Query(java.lang.String Author,
            java.lang.String Title,
            java.lang.String Subject)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Queries the server for book entries that satisfy the given conditions
        Parameters:
        Author - name of the author (name or "")
        Title - title of the book (title or "")
        Returns:
        true if the request was sent, false if it failed to send
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the result of a failure

      • Query

              throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        ISBN - the ISBN code for the book
        Returns:
        true if the request was sent, false if it failed to send
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the result of a failure
